name: LordOfZ
description:
Beware fellow humans, we are incoming !

You are the Zombie Lord Commander and your duty is to devour every human on Earth. In order to succeed in your quest, we gathered multiple human samples. Train your skills on these different puzzles.

Long , this game was created in 3 days for a technical test in a hypercasual company and this was my first attempt in creating a mobile game on Unity.

I don't own any asset or animation in the game.
